item.title: Your next Marriott hotel room might be a cabin in the woods
item.description: The world’s largest hotel company is adding tiny cabins and nature retreats, on the heels of similar moves by Hyatt and Hilton.

item.title: How I sent Buzz Lightyear to space—and what it taught me about innovation
item.description: Getting a Pixar toy up to the International Space Station took bravery and creativity, says Disney alum Duncan Wardle.

item.title: CNBC is reportedly planning a streaming service
item.description: Stand-alone service is set to launch in the first quarter of 2025.

item.title: Shark Tank judge Daymond John reveals a 3 step approach for building wealth that anyone can follow
item.description: Lucky breaks or keen investments are nothing without strategy and long-term vision.

item.title: Marc Benioff warns excessive AI spending is a ‘race to the bottom,’ and he plans to take advantage of it
item.description: Benioff has previously warned that AI is overhyped.
